media:group.media:title: O Love of God
media:group.media:description:
We are pleased to present our second video with scenes of God's wonderful creation, accompanied by 18 sacred hymns about the marvelous love of God. We pray you will be richly blessed by this video.
You can download a free DVD, audio CD, or MP3's of this video at http://www.formypeople.org

entry.title: Presentation by Florida Hospital Church Lifelong Kids

media:group.media:title: Presentation by Florida Hospital Church Lifelong Kids
media:group.media:description:
Live Christmas Musical Double Feature December 1, 2018 at 5:00 PM
In this presentation of the birth of Christ, it is a tragic reality that the Florida Hospital Church approves of children singing and dancing to some of the world’s worst music and its beats. This is just one example why God must allow even young children to be “consumed in the cleansing fire of God’s wrath” that will fall on Seventh-day Adventist organized churches and other institutions, as mentioned in the “Final Events and the First Supper” dream.
If you would like to view the entire presentation, you can find the video at https://livestream.com/accounts/12470575/events/8476242/videos/184245314. If you start at the beginning of the video, it will be blank until after the 3-minute mark.

entry.title: Will You Have a Song to Sing?

media:group.media:title: Will You Have a Song to Sing?
media:group.media:description:
What is so special about the 144,000? Why does Ellen White encourage God’s people to “strive” to be a part of that group? What will it take to be one of the chosen ones? What will be required of them? In heaven, what will they be and do that will make all the suffering worthwhile? In this sermon, pastor Ernie Knoll addresses these questions and brings out important points to ponder as we prepare to witness the unfolding of earth's final events.
http://www.formypeople.org

media:group.media:title: Commandments and Symbols
media:group.media:description:
Please note, this video is audio only.
Without faith it is impossible to please God. Sometimes God asks us to do things, but at the time we do not understand the 'why.' Sometimes what God asks us to do has a greater, symbolic message. Do we have the faith to obey, like the patriarchs and prophets did throughout history? Men like Isaiah, Hosea, and Abraham demonstrated extraordinary faith when asked to do extremely difficult and even unusual things. In this message, Ernie Knoll explores trust and obedience in the light of some recent natural disasters.
http://www.formypeople.org

media:group.media:title: Respect for God's Messengers
media:group.media:description:
Please note: This message is audio only.
Since the beginning, God has chosen messengers to be a mouthpiece for Him. Many times they have had to deliver messages of reproof, warning, encouragement, and instruction for His people. Over the course of months, Pastor Knoll has been shown how the messengers of God have been disrespected, mocked, and ridiculed. He was instructed to prepare a message that gives Bible examples of those messengers and what happened when the messages were not taken seriously. God has sent many messages in our time for His people to prepare for His imminent return. Have those messages been heeded?
You can listen to and download this audio message at www.formypeople.org/product/respect-for-gods-messengers/

media:group.media:title: Maravillas de la Creación
media:group.media:description:
El Ministerio Para Mi Pueblo presenta escenas de la maravillosa creación de Dios, acompañada con 18 himnos sagrados. Este video, basado en los dos primeros capítulos de Génesis, es un testamento al poder y gloria de nuestro Dios Creador.
En el sitio: http://www.formypeople.org, usted puede descargar un DVD de este video, un CD-Audio, y los himnos en formato MP3.

media:group.media:title: Wonders of Creation
media:group.media:description:
For My People Ministry presents scenes of God's wonderful creation, accompanied by 18 sacred hymns. This video, based on the first two chapters of Genesis, is a testament to the power and glory of our Creator God.
You can download a free DVD, audio CD, or MP3's of this video at http://www.formypeople.org

media:group.media:title: Wonders of Creation Trailer
media:group.media:description: We are happy to announce that For My People Ministry (http://www.formypeople.org) has prepared a new DVD titled “Wonders of Creation.” A year in the making, this video features sacred hymns with creation scenes from around the world, almost all filmed by For My People Ministry volunteers.

media:group.media:title: Fe para el Fin
media:group.media:description: Nota: El mensaje está en formato audio solamente. Con demasiada frecuencia, la fe es un término abstracto que oímos mencionar en la iglesia. Se nos dice que Dios quiere que su pueblo tenga fe en Él, pero ¿qué es la fe, y cómo mostramos que la tenemos? En este mensaje, predicado el 17 de diciembre de 2016, el pastor Knoll comparte historias bíblicas y detalles poco conocidos que ilustran cómo esos personajes bíblicos se esforzaron por vivir su fe, y qué es lo que Dios busca en su pueblo hoy.

media:group.media:title: Faith for the End
media:group.media:description:
PLEASE NOTE: This message was live streamed and we experienced some minor internet issues resulting in a few words being missed.
All too often, faith is an abstract term we hear talked about in church. We are told that God wants His people to have faith in Him, but what is faith, and how do we show we have it? In this message, pastor Knoll shares Bible stories and little-known details that illustrate how those people struggled to live their faith, and what God is looking for in His people today.

media:group.media:title: Fruit of the Spirit
media:group.media:description:
The Bible says that “by their fruits ye shall know them” (Matthew 7:20). For My People Ministry has existed for almost six years. Many have claimed over those years that Ernie Knoll’s dreams are a deception and are leading people away from God. But is this true? In this video presentation, we share how the hearts of many are being changed by the work God has ordained For My People Ministry to do. You can find many other testimonials on our website at http://formypeople.org/En/testimonials_current.shtml.
What is the fruit of this ministry? God’s truths are being advocated, and many individuals are renouncing sin and preparing for heaven. In the dream “Entertainment vs. Truth,” this is exactly what Jesus said was happening: “Jesus calls me by my heavenly name again and tells me that the messages I am providing are touching more hearts than I realize. There are many who are searching and many who are finding truth for the first time. The messages are reaching many outside God’s church and are also reminders to those who have studied but forgotten.” ​
El Fruto del Espíritu
Dice la Biblia, “por sus frutos los conoceréis” (Mateo 7:20). El Ministerio Para Mi Pueblo existe hace casi seis años. Con el paso del tiempo, muchos han afirmado que los sueños de Ernie Knoll son un engaño y que están apartando a la gente de Dios. Pero, ¿es eso verdad? En este video presentamos cómo los corazones de muchos están cambiando a través de la obra que Dios ha mandado hacer al Ministerio Para Mi Pueblo. En nuestro sitio web hay muchos otros testimonios: http://formypeople.org/Sp/testimonials_current.shtml.
¿Cuál es el fruto de este ministerio? Se están defendiendo las verdades de Dios, y muchos individuos están renunciando el pecado y preparándose para el cielo. En el sueño, “ El Entretenimiento vs. La Verdad”, esto es precisamente lo que dijo Jesús que estaba ocurriendo. “Nuevamente, Jesús me llama por mi nombre celestial y me dice que los mensajes que estoy dando están tocando más corazones de lo que yo me imagino. Hay muchos que buscan, y muchos que están hallando la verdad por primera vez. Los mensajes están llegando a muchos que están fuera de la iglesia de Dios, y también sirven de recordatorio a los que han estudiado, pero se han olvidado”.

entry.title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 8 - Worship & Church Growth

media:group.media:title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 8 - Worship & Church Growth
media:group.media:description:
Ellen White warned that false music would be introduced into our churches just prior to the close of probation. That time has come. In an effort to make church attractive and for church growth, many Seventh-day Adventist churches have adopted Satan’s music. But what does God think about these worship services?
Produced by For My People Ministry (http://www.formypeople.org)

entry.title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 5 - Higher Criticism - Part I

media:group.media:title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 5 - Higher Criticism - Part I
media:group.media:description:
Ellen White predicted that once her writings were made of none effect, people would lose faith in the Bible. And this is just what has happened. Many scholars today now deny the authority of the Bible under the pretense of higher criticism. The authority of the Bible has been superseded by science and culture. In Part I of this subject, we look at how the creation account in the book of Genesis is being undermined in the Seventh-day Adventist Church.
Produced by For My People Ministry (http://www.formypeople.org)

entry.title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 12 - Revival & Reformation

media:group.media:title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 12 - Revival & Reformation
media:group.media:description:
Since Ted Wilson was elected as the Seventh-day Adventist General Conference president, there has been much talk among the church’s leaders and members about revival and reformation. Yet sadly, very little has been said about what we are to reform from. In Josiah’s day, the reformation was achieved when all traces of sin were removed from the land. This is not happening today. Instead, the Seventh-day Adventist Church is going deeper into apostasy. What will it take to achieve a true revival and reformation? What will it take for the church to be ready for the outpouring of the latter rain?
Produced by For My People Ministry (http://www.formypeople.org)

entry.title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 6 - Higher Criticism - Part II

media:group.media:title: Apostasy in Our Midst - Episode 6 - Higher Criticism - Part II
media:group.media:description:
Having undermined the creation account in the book of Genesis, as seen in the previous episode, higher critics are now determined to destroy the marriage institution. This began subtly when the Seventh-day Adventist Church denied the Bible’s counsel regarding gender roles and ordained women as elders back in the 1970’s. Now there is a large movement within the church to disregard the Bible’s authority and ordain women as pastors. The downward step in apostasy will not end there. Based on similar arguments, higher critics are now advocating the acceptance of homosexuality, a sin that God considers an abomination.
Produced by For My People Ministry (http://www.formypeople.org)
